::Slag::
"Pff..I'll get there on my own time, Grimmmmmmlock.  You ain't the
boss, never was, and never WILL BE. GOT IT!." he stares straight into
the eyes of Grimlcok.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Sunstreaker leans over to Ironhide, and could hear him talking to Spike,
> Hound, and some other old Autobots. "Well He cant be all that bad"
> Ironhide is trying to convince people. Sunstreaker adds his two sense
> into this, "Well I think your making a mistake, Grimlock has a point,".
> Sideswipe looks at his brother, "Shut up, he'll do fine, thats why
> Grimlock is going along, to keep him on his toes,". "Enough" Ironhide
> says, as he gets up and transforms, heading for the area of launch.
> Sideswipe and Sunstreaker quickly follow suite. Then the image zooms in
> and out, then in again. Then in the rafters there is movement, and a
> clicking noise can be heard, then a transformation, as a camera turns
> into three robots, and flies up through a hole in the cieling, followed
> by a bat. The four robots float through Cybertrons skies, away from the
> Autobot/Maximal zone, towards Predacon territory. Soon, they will arrive
> at their destination.
>
> Ironhide Transforms when he reaches a large garage. Sideswipe and his
> brother stay in their car modes. "Come on Hoist, dont be late for lift
> off" he yells into the garrage. Hoist walks out, bidding farewell to
> Grapple. "You sure you want to go through with this?" Ironhide asks.
> "Sure Im sure" he says, transforming into his tow truck, and zooming
> ahead, then followed by Ironhide.
>
> Grimlock watches Swoop leave their domain. "Come Dinobots, time we go,
> Show Maximals how you do Exploring" he boasts, as he stands up.
